title: Lakers, Patriots, NBA, Russell Westbrook, where Colin was right & wrong
itunes:title: Lakers, Patriots, NBA, Russell Westbrook, where Colin was right & wrong
description:
Colin discusses why the Lakers can't win the NBA title, Bill Belichick being less strict after Tom Brady, a possible problem with the NBA, where he was right and wrong, and Russell Westbrook testing positive for Covid-19. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Mark Medina, Bruce Feldman, and Greg Jennings.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
